name: Forger
description:
world size (temp) -  8192 x 8192 chunks

chunk size - 16x16 voxels(blocks)

chunk height (temp) - 128 voxels(blocks) , from bedrock to ground level

Controls :

I - for opening the creative inventory

F8 - for removing the building overlay

F3 - debug screen 

left shift - sprint

w / a / s / d (arrow keys) - forward / left / back / right  

space bar - jump
